long_description: Does your little one live to shred? Get them the Burton Grom snowboard boots, featuring oversize features and Room-to-Grow footbeds to keep them happy on the hill. Dual-zone, oversize rip-and-stick straps are easy for little paws to operate without Mom and Dad's help. Linerless design features Thinsulate(TM) insulation to keep those li'l piggies warm all day long in the snow. EVA Room-to-Grow footbeds allow you to simply remove a layer of the footbed as the fit becomes too snug. DynoLite outsoles are soft-flexing for better balance when riding and hiking; ice spikes take hold on ice and snow. Outsole sizing indicators let you see how much space is left before it's time to remove the footbeds.
